pasugiya pebarawari 19 wanida parlimenthuwedi me pilibandawa idiripath kala ketumpatha eekachchandayen sammatha wiya.2012 warshaye agosthu masa sita sigarat pakattuwaka idiripasa ha pasupasa siyayata 80 k aawaranaya wana paridi rupamaya saukhya anathuru angawim atak samanga nithiya kriyathmaka kirima sandaha anumathiya pala karamin rajaya 2012 agosthu 8 wanida wishesha gasat niwedanayak da prakashayata pathkaranu labina.mita erehiwa dumkola samagama saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahathata saha dumkola ha mathpan pilibanda jathika adhikariyata erehiwa nadu pawaranu labiya.me prashnaya adhikaranaya hamuwe idiripath wi thibena nisa sigarat pakattuwe depasa siyayata asuwak aawaranaya wana paridden rupamaya saukhya anathuru angawim pala kirima aniwarya kirime nithiya kriyathmaka kirima methek pramadayata pathwimata hethuwa wi thibe.dumkola saha mathpan pilibanda jathika adhikariye samajika waidya lalith chandradasa mahatha pawasuwe parlimenthuwe eekachchandayen sammatha wu me pilibandawa nithiya pilibandawa adhikaranaya nisi thinduwak labadewi yayi apeksha karana bawa ya.dumpanaya nisa rogi thaththwayata pathwi dinakata miya yana sankhyawa 60 - 65 athara we.
